thread.title: Karen Hirst
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Karen Hirst

author: Karen Hirst
title: Karen Hirst
text: Had a really good experience with this company. I didn't pay for next day delivery but got it. I sent my jacket back due to the colour not suiting me and was refunded almost straightaway.
